attributes.action: support our campaign to prevent Coombes Farm, Rochford, being concreted over with 330 houses by strengthening green belt and protection of the highest grade agricultural land legislation to ensure such land is protected for for future generations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are a small group of concerned residents who have formed Residents Against Coombes Expansion, dedicated to fighting proposals to build on this green belt and high grade agricultural land.  It is also a special protection area and site of special scientific interest. It is rich in wildlife and the footpath forms part of the Roach Valley Way, a rural route used by thousands of visitors and residents.  The site is also situated directly beneath Southend Airport's flight path. Our website is www.race.moonfruit.com
